name: [redacted] Life
description:
## Hello? Can anyone read this?
## I don't know if you can see this, but I need your help.
## I need you to s̝̲̪̬̀t̴͚͍͙̼̘̟ͅo͚̣̙͝ͅṕ̥̳̳̫ ҉̭h̴̰̜̣̳͍e͕̣͖̮̫̯͘ṛ̹̳ͅ ̖̰͕̩̰̪̜b̞̪̺̬e̺̥̻͔̩f̘͇̩̖̳͞o̱̜̠̗̬̼͉r̖̦̭̩͉̳͙e̛̹̫ ̴͍̳̟i̙̺͎͕ͅt̙̠̟͝'̞̘̕s͏̼̞ ̹̦̱͕̦̰t̻̞o̭o̩̭̘̘̙̟ ͏̖̮̱̖l͈̫̭̯a̮̖̤̘̩̩͘t̳̱͇̹e͙͟.̬̞̩̹̗͚͡

Adrian has just moved into an old mansion with his girlfriend, Rebecca. After another couple hurriedly leave the mansion, a spooky backstory about the house is revealed, and some seemingly unexplainable events occur, Adrian comes to a conclusion...

He realises that he is in a horror game. A badly-written horror game.

And he wants to leave...

Official Website | Lemma Soft Thread | Lemma Soft WIP Thread

Also, if you like my work, please consider pledging to my Patreon page. There are rewards for patrons there.

Behind-the-scenes article

Version 1.6:  Edited rpy file to make it easier to read. Fixed typos.

Version 1.5:  Slightly edited the ending's code for the benefit of players who haven't saved their game.

Version 1.4:  Fixed typo.

Version 1.3:  Edited text speed effects.  Fixed typos.

Version 1.1:  Text fonts added to the "Game" folder to solve "font not found" error some players have. Instances where characters' thoughts are displayed as dialogue are now fixed.
